Pages.Text: Yes, but I still don't understand why you're doing this.
I told you already, something shady is going on and it is my responsibility to find out what.
Ah, ah, ah! What did I tell you about using codenames?

(Sigh)
I already told you, Pop Pixie, I doubt Mr Mentoe is up to anything nefarious. And why don't I get a code name?
Code names are for field agents, and I would appreciate it if you used mine. We still don't know if this line is tapped or not.
What are you talking about? You just bought some $2 walkie-talkies from a bargain bin!
The more inconspicuous the better. Anyway, where am I going?
If you're looking for "secrets", they're most likely kept in the main office on the top floor. Make your way to the elevator and you should be fine from there.
